INVERT(6D)                                           INVERT(6D)





NAME
       invert - invert an image

SYNOPSIS
       invert inimage outimage

DESCRIPTION
       invert  inverts  an  image. pixel values of 0 become 255
       and pixel values of 255 map  to  0.  The  result  is  to
       invert the tonal scale of an image.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                INVERT(6D)
